title: Brand New Community & Up to 6 Weeks Free -Richmond, TX
posting_body: ['For leasing info call or text', 'show contact info', 'today!', 'Ask about ID#810937', 'Apartment Features:', 'Inviting, Open-Concept Floor Plans', 'Wood Style Flooring', 'Natural Stone Countertops', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Spacious Designer Closets', 'Undermount Stainless Steel Sinks', 'Stainless Steel Appliance Suite', 'Private Yards *', 'Salto Smart Locks', 'Full LED Lighting Packages', 'Digital Programmable Thermostats', '*', 'In Select Apartment Homes', 'Community Features:', 'Swimming Pool', 'Conservatory', 'Outdoor Gathering Spaces', '24-Hour Strength & Cardio Fitness Center', 'Resident Clubhouse with Library & Kitchen', 'Large and Small Dog Parks with Observation Pavilion', 'Fenced Dog Park', 'Private Attached & Detached Garages & Carports', 'Secure Package Lockers', 'Beautifully Manicured Grounds', 'Gated Entry', 'Surrounding our community, there is a variety of dining options where residents can explore new dining options and find restaurants for everyone to enjoy.', "Near our luxury apartments in Richmond, TX, you can find restaurants like Sandy McGee's, Larry's Original Mexican, and Baytown Seafood."]
